summary: You always knew you were a Conqueror, now its time to dress the part! Dawn the armor of a Conquistador and take what you want from the godless heathens of Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=times new roman][size=4][url=https://www.facebook.com/CH.3dArt/]
Like my page on Facebook to stay informed about my work![/url][/size]


[size=24pt][color=#ffa500] [/color][b][color=#f1c232]Conquistador Armor[/color][color=#e69138] [/color][/b][/size][/font][/center]
[font=comic sans ms][size=5pt]You always knew you were a Conqueror, now its time to dress the part! Dawn the armor of a Conquistador and take what you want from the godless heathens of Skyrim![/size][/font]



[font=times new roman][color=orange][b][size=5]A Word from the Author[/size][/b][/color]
[size=4]So I finally finished this armor which is one of a number of projects I started a while back and never really finished. The armor is only for males, but the helmet can be used for all genders and races. I probably won't be doing a female version of the armor.

Have fun! And don't forget to kill responsibly!
[/size]


[color=orange][size=5pt][b]How to Aquire the Armor![/b][/size][/color]

[size=4][b]Option 1:[/b]
-Go to the location identified in the screenshots and find it!

[b]Option 2:[/b]
- Press ~ to open up the cheat menu
- Type [i][color=orange]help conquistador[/color][/i] and press enter
- You should see a list of all 4 items and their numerical codes
- Type [i][color=orange]player.additem 66666666 1[/color][/i] and replace the 6s with the code of the item you want to spawn
- Do this for all 4 pieces and whala! Your a conquistador!
[/size]


[color=orange][size=5pt][b]Version History[/b][/size][/color]

[size=4pt][b]Version 1.0[/b]
-Initial Upload


[b]Version 1.1[/b]
-1st Person added
-More depth added to textures
-The armor had been added to the gameworld along with a shaky less than exquisite back-story (see screens for location)[/size]



[center][color=orange][b][size=5]My Other Mods[/size][/b][/color][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30649][img]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/9664/greekarmorurllink.gif[/img][/url][/center]



[color=orange][b][size=5]Other Mods of Interest[/size][/b][/color]

[size=4]-Some great retextures for the Conquistador armor can be found here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30101]Go[/url]

-Jaysus Swords has a couple weapons that fit perfectly with this armors theme: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1002]Go[/url]

-Of course nothing could be better than throwing a gun into the mix: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26653]Go[/url]

-Tropical Skyrim changes Skyrims theme to a more caribbean setting:[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33017/]Go[/url]

-Catwoman1989 has created some fantastic retextures for the conquistador armor and for several other things in this great retexture mod which goes hand in hand with Tropical Skyrim:[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33263]Go[/url]

Don't forget to endorse these authors works if you use them!
[/size]


[color=orange][b][size=5pt]Credits:[/size][/b][/color]
[size=4]-Bethesda - For this epic game!
-The author and contributors of the "Creating an Armour for Skyrim" tutorial - Without this I would not have created this armor for Skyrim! [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php/Creating_an_armour_for_Skyrim._Part_1]link[/url][/size][/font]
author: sirwho
